documentation.title: Trailing Commas in Attribute Blocks
documentation.standard: Require a trailing comma for multi-line attribute blocks in which multiple attributes are being instantiated.

code.title: Valid: Multiple attributes in a multi-line attribute block with trailing comma.
Invalid: Multiple attributes in a multi-line attribute block without trailing comma.

documentation.standard: Forbid trailing commas in attribute blocks in all other cases.

code.title: Valid: Single line attribute block without trailing comma.
Invalid: Single line attribute block with trailing comma.
Valid: Single attribute in a multi-line attribute block without trailing comma.
Invalid: Single attribute in a multi-line attribute block with trailing comma.
